display_name: [Demon King's Great Wish] Demon King Piccolo (Elder)

kit.leader_skill: "Demonic Power" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +80%

super_attack.name: Magekisen
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy

ultra_super_attack.name: Explosive Demon Light Cannon
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Demonic Alliance
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Extreme Class allies' ATK & DEF 50% up, plus an additional ATK & DEF 10% up for characters who also belong to the "Demonic Power" Category; (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained; When attacking: ATK & DEF 100% up; Per "Demonic Power" Category ally or Extreme Class ally on the team (depending on which has more members): ATK & DEF 20% up when attacking (up to 100%); When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Demonic Power" Category characters, or when all allies are Extreme Class characters: Guards all attacks; As the 3rd attacker in a turn: High chance of evading enemy's attack

lines.text: Extreme Class allies' ATK & DEF 50% up, plus an additional ATK & DEF 10% up for characters who also belong to the "Demonic Power" Category
Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained
ATK & DEF 100% up
ATK & DEF 20% up when attacking (up to 100%)
lines.context: Per "Demonic Power" Category ally or Extreme Class ally on the team (depending on which has more members)

lines.text: Guards all attacks
lines.context: When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Demonic Power" Category characters, or when all allies are Extreme Class characters

lines.text: High chance of evading enemy's attack
lines.context: As the 3rd attacker in a turn

standby_skill.name: Enters Standby Mode
standby_skill.effect: Stands by for 4 turns During which 7 Dragon Balls appear and charge count increases by 1 per Dragon Ball obtained by allies Standby Condition(s) Can be activated when all allies attacking in the same turn are "Demonic Power" Category characters starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle, when all allies are Extreme Class starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle, or starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle (once only)

finish_skills.name: Destruction Brought by the Demon King Himself
finish_skills.effect: Raises ATK by 100% temporarily per charge count and causes ultimate damage to enemy Finish Skill Condition(s) Can be activated when charge count is 6 or less (once only)

finish_skills.name: Power of Youth
finish_skills.effect: Restores youth and becomes Demon King Piccolo Finish Skill Condition(s) Can be activated when charge count is 7 (once only)
